title: Bakery Order Automation
problem: Sarah's bakery was receiving orders through 5 different channels: phone, SMS, Facebook, Instagram, and email. She spent 4-5 hours daily just transcribing orders into her notebook, leading to errors and missed opportunities. Peak seasons meant working until midnight to organize the next day's baking schedule.
solution: We built a custom order management system that consolidated all order channels into a single dashboard. Customers can now place orders through a simple web form, and the system automatically organizes them by pickup date and baking schedule. The dashboard shows real-time inventory needs, prevents overbooking, and generates daily baking schedules automatically.

testimonial.quote: This system gave me my evenings back. I used to stay up until midnight organizing orders. Now everything's done automatically, and I can focus on baking.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson
